about_the_game:
Get ready for the ultimate block-breaking adventure in Cannon Block Ball, a vibrant and fun physics-based game where every shot counts! Your goal is simple: aim and fire your balls to knock down an array of unique blocks from platforms. But don’t be fooled by the simplicity—each level introduces exciting challenges that will test your precision and problem-solving skills.

Encounter a variety of block types, from explosive bombs that trigger satisfying chain reactions, to rotating blocks that keep you on your toes, and growing blocks that demand perfect timing. Moving walls and toggles add to the strategic depth, requiring you to think carefully about your approach as you progress through increasingly complex puzzles.

With colorful, engaging graphics and smooth, intuitive controls, Cannon Block Ball is perfect for quick, casual gaming sessions, yet offers enough depth to keep puzzle enthusiasts hooked. Whether you're tackling towering block structures from multiple shooting angles or mastering the precise mechanics, the fun never stops!

Key Features:

  • Physics-based gameplay: Use realistic physics to launch balls and knock down blocks.

  • Variety of block types: Encounter explosive bombs, breakable blocks, rotating blocks, and growing blocks that challenge your strategy.

  • Dynamic puzzles: Tackle moving walls and toggles that create new obstacles and solutions.

  • Multiple shooting areas: Approach levels from different angles, adding strategic depth to each puzzle.

  • Gradual difficulty: Face more complex block towers and puzzles as you progress.

  • Colorful visuals and smooth controls: Easy-to-learn controls combined with vibrant graphics make the game accessible for all players.

  • Casual yet engaging: Perfect for quick gaming sessions or longer playthroughs, with satisfying mechanics and rewarding block-breaking action.

Whether you're looking for a fun break or aiming to master every level, Cannon Block Ball offers a satisfying mix of action, strategy, and physics-based challenges!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 461 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS (desktop-amd64)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz × 4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Corporation GM107M [GeForce GTX 960M]
  • Storage: 461 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

name: Cannon Block Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6300HQ CPU @ 2.30GHz × 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Corporation GM107M [GeForce GTX 960M]
  • Storage: 460 MB available space

short_description: Knock down blocks from the platform using balls in this physics-based game. Encounter various block types, from explosive bombs to rotating and growing blocks, adding challenge and strategy to the gameplay.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
